titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cibacron Scarlet LS-2G HC.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/10/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2003, the duty on 2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, 7,7'-((2-methyl-1,5-pentanediyl) bis(imino(6-fluoro-1,3,5- triazine-4,2-diyl) imino)) bis (4-hydroxy-3-((4-methoxy sulfophenyl) azo)-, potassium sodium salt (Cibacron Scarlet LS-2G HC).
